Body:
a = pd.DataFrame({MEASUREMENT: [1.0]})
b = pd.DataFrame({TIME: [1.0]})
with tempfile.NamedTemporaryFile(mode='w', delete=True) as fh:
    filename_a = fh.name
    a.to_csv(fh, sep='\t', index=False)
    fh.flush()
    expected = pd.DataFrame({MEASUREMENT: [1.0, nan], TIME: [nan, 1.0]})
    assert expected.equals(petab.concat_tables([a, b], petab.measurements.
        get_measurement_df))
    assert expected.equals(petab.concat_tables([filename_a, b], petab.
        measurements.get_measurement_df))
